channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenPages with Watson
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenPages with Watson

item.title: CVE-2023-38738|2024-08-02T17:54:38.308Z -- ibm -- openpages%20with%20watson
item.description: IBM OpenPages with Watson 8.3 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security in a OpenPages environment using Native authentication. If OpenPages is using Native authentication an attacker with access to the OpenPages database could through a series of specially crafted steps could exploit this weakness and gain unauthorized access to other OpenPages accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 262594.

item.title: CVE-2023-40683|2024-08-02T18:38:51.162Z -- ibm -- openpages%20with%20watson
item.description: IBM OpenPages with Watson 8.3 and 9.0 could allow remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by insufficient authorization checks. By authenticating as an OpenPages user and using non-public APIs, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security and gain unauthorized administrative access to the application. IBM X-Force ID: 264005.
